Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to authorizing Chautauqua county to impose an additional one percent rate of sales and compensating use taxes
Summary: Extends the authorization for Chautauqua county to impose an additional one percent rate of sales and compensating use taxes.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to authorizing Chautauqua county to impose an additional one percent rate of sales and compensating use taxes
